name: Inuit Uppirijatuqangit
summary:
Inuit Uppirijatuqangit - ᐃᓄᐃᑦ ᐅᑉᐱᕆᔭᑐᖃᖏᑦ is a hidden object game in which users explore 4 unique areas in and around an Inuit community.

Click on characters and find real Inuit Myths hidden. Complete with animation and music from Kathleen Ivaluarjuk Merritt users will learn Inuit Mythology while enjoying the challenge of finding each myth.
